plptool

Class PLPAsm

  • java.lang.Object
    • plptool.PLPAsm
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    Asm

    public abstract class PLPAsm
extends java.lang.Object
    PLPTool assembler abstract.

      Entry point to the assembled program to be optionally used by the rest of the framework

      An array list of build error objects that can be used to relate back to the source file index and the line number where the source of the error is

      • sourceList

        Assembly source files attached to this assembler

        protected int[] objCodeFileMapper

      • objCodeLineNumMapper

        protected int[] objCodeLineNumMapper

      • entryPoint

        protected long entryPoint
        Entry point to the assembled program to be optionally used by the rest of the framework

      • pass1Str

        protected java.lang.StringBuilder pass1Str
        First pass string builder. Use this object for faster string manipulation such as appending preprocessed text

      • preprocessedAsm

        protected java.lang.String preprocessedAsm
        Optional preprocessed assembly string to be used by assemble()

      • errorList

        protected java.util.ArrayList<PLPBuildError> errorList
        An array list of build error objects that can be used to relate back to the source file index and the line number where the source of the error is

      • addrTable

        protected long[] addrTable
        The address table attached to this assembler.
        See Also:
        objectCode[]

      • objectCode

        protected long[] objectCode
        The object code attached to this assembler.
        See Also:
        preprocess(int), assemble(), getObjectCode()

      • asmIndex

        protected int asmIndex
        Current index of assembly file

      • regionMap

        protected java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.Integer> regionMap
        The region of which each object code entry belongs to. This is implementation specific and used by the linker to generate final program.

      • symTable

        protected java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,java.lang.Long> symTable
        Assembler symbol table.
        See Also:
        objectCode[]

      • assembled

        protected boolean assembled
        This variable describes the state of the asm sources attached to this assembler. This variable is set true when all assembly sources were successfully assembled and objectCode[], addrtable[] and symTable are populated.

    • Constructor Detail

      • PLPAsm

        public PLPAsm(java.lang.String strAsm,
              java.lang.String strFilePath)
        Constructor for the assembler object that takes a string of assembly and informational assembly file path. This constructor will create and populate the source list with one assembly source
        Parameters:
        strAsm - Source string
        strFilePath - Source path information

      • PLPAsm

        public PLPAsm(java.util.ArrayList<PLPAsmSource> asms)
        Constructor for the assembler object that takes an arraylist of PLPAsmSource objects
        Parameters:
        asms - List ouf assembly sources

    • Method Detail

      • getVersion

        public java.lang.String getVersion()
        PLPAsm defaults to returning the current version of PLPTool. User assemblers can override this. May be useful for dynamic modules
        Returns:
        String of PLPTool version

      • preprocess

        public abstract int preprocess(int index)
        Call the preprocess routine of the assembler
        Parameters:
        index - Source file index to start preprocess with
        Returns:
        PLP_OK or error code

      • assemble

        public abstract int assemble()
        Call the assemble routine of the assembler
        Returns:
        PLP_OK or error code

      • appendPreprocessedAsm

        protected void appendPreprocessedAsm(java.lang.String str,
                                     int lineNum,
                                     boolean newline)
        Append the preprocessed assembly string. This method also updates the assembly file and line number mapping for error reporting purposes.
        Parameters:
        index - The 'preprocessed assembly' line number.
        str - Text to add to the string.
        lineNum - The line number of the assembly file currently being preprocessed.

      • getObjectCode

        public long[] getObjectCode()
        Return the object code array attached to this assembler object.
        Returns:
        Returns the object code as array of longs.

      • getAddrTable

        public long[] getAddrTable()
        Return the instruction addresses array attached to this assembler object.
        Returns:
        Returns the address table as array of longs.

      • getSymTable

        public java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,java.lang.Long> getSymTable()
        Return the symbol table attached to this assembler object.
        Returns:
        Returns the symbol table as a HashMap.

      • getFileMapper

        public int[] getFileMapper()
        Get the file mapper array. The index of the array is where the object code is stored in the object code array. The value is the source file ID when assembly was done.
        Returns:
        An array mapping the object code index to the source file ID

      • getLineNumMapper

        public int[] getLineNumMapper()
        Get the line number array. The index of the array is where the object code is stored in the object code array. The value is the line number where this instruction came from.
        Returns:
        An array mapping the object code index to the source file line number

      • getFileIndex

        public int getFileIndex(long addr)
        Get the index of the source file where the instruction specified by the address came from.
        Parameters:
        addr - Address of the instruction
        Returns:
        The index of the source file where the instruction came from

      • getLineNum

        public int getLineNum(long addr)
        Get the line number of the code where the instruction specified by the address came from
        Parameters:
        addr - Address of the instruction
        Returns:
        The index of the source file where the instruction came from

      • getAddrFromFileMetadata

        public long getAddrFromFileMetadata(int fileIndex,
                                    int lineNum)
        Return the address of a given line of code in a source file
        Parameters:
        fileIndex - The index of the source file
        lineNum - The line number of the code
        Returns:
        The address of the resulting instruction, or -1 if the search fails

      • setSymTable

        public void setSymTable(java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,java.lang.Long> symTable)
        Attach a new symbol table to this assembler object
        Parameters:
        symTable - New symbol table to attach

      • getRegionMap

        public java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.Integer> getRegionMap()
        Return the region map
        Returns:
        The region map

      • lookupLabel

        public java.lang.String lookupLabel(long address)
        Lookup if the provided memory address has a label attached to it in the symbol table.
        Parameters:
        address - memory address to look up
        Returns:
        Returns the label in String if found, null otherwise

      • resolveAddress

        public long resolveAddress(java.lang.String label)
        Return the address associated with the given label, if it exists
        Parameters:
        label - Label to look up
        Returns:
        The address associated with the label, or PLP_ERROR_RETURN if it's not in the symtable

      • lookupAddrIndex

        public int lookupAddrIndex(long addr)
        Return the index associated with the given address. Can be used to trace back an address to the source file
        Parameters:
        addr - Address to look up
        Returns:
        Index where that address resides in the address table

      • isAssembled

        public boolean isAssembled()
        Return whether the source files attached to this assembler have been successfully assembled.
        Returns:
        Returns boolean true if all sources are assembled, false otherwise

      • getAsmList

        public java.util.ArrayList<PLPAsmSource> getAsmList()
        Return the sourceList attached to this assembly.
        Returns:
        Returns sourceList as ArrayList

      • getEntryPoint

        public long getEntryPoint()
        Get entry point of the program (first .text directive)
        Returns:
        Entry point address

      • setAssembled

        public void setAssembled(boolean b)
        Force this assembler object to be marked assembled or not
        Parameters:
        b -

      • preSimulationCheck

        public int preSimulationCheck()
        Other ISA-specific checks that the develop may wish to do. Any return value other than PLP_OK will prevent the start of the simulation
        Returns:
        ProjectDriver expects PLP_OK to continue with the simulation

      • getErrorList

        public final java.util.ArrayList<PLPBuildError> getErrorList()
        Get the build error list from this assembler object
        Returns:
        An array list of the build error objects

      • hook

        public java.lang.Object hook(java.lang.Object param)
        Overridable developer-specified generic hook.
        Parameters:
        param - An object to pass to the hook
        Returns:
        A reference to an object returned from the hook function
